Articles.Content:
Hello there!


I've got a little problem over here, my difficulty options are somehow broken.
Someone told me it was caused by too many mods (in my case 164 ), but I think that's not true.
After uninstalling more than half of my mods, it didn't fixed anything.
I tried every mod I've installed, but I didn't found anything.

Maybe I missed something?
Any suggestions?

KSP: 1.3.1.1891 Windows 10 64bit

Mods installed:

Album a/MXJDS will appear when post is submitted

Edited January 2, 2018 by ofm00769

It's because you have a lot of mods that add difficulty settings. 

From the screenshots, it looks like you're just having some GUI glitches, nothing game breaking, so it doesn't matter that much right?
It does matter, I can't change some mod settings, then the game is unplayable for me

Yeah it just looks like the KSP devs never expected *that many* items to exist in the list when they opened up the ability for modders to add their own options to the difficulty settings list, so they didn't design that list to be scrollable with a max window size.

Instead they just let the window stretch as tall as it needs to to fit all the buttons in the list, and it gets broken when there's enough buttons that it can't fit all of it on the screen.

(One frustration I have, as one of the people using this feature, is that modders are indirectly encouraged to over-use the difficulty options feature for things that are emphatically NOT about difficulty at all, and this is just because it's the only place we can plug in to the per-savegame settings rather than global ones.  If a modder wants some sort of setting that stays inside that one saved game folder, instead of being global, that's where it goes, even though it has nothing to do with difficulty.  That's why there's such a large number of things on that list.)
